long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Maximizes all windows in browser. (Manifest V3)

This extension is in beta/test version.
Certain extension functionality was lost during Google's update to Manifest V3.
More requested features are to come; hopefully, soon.

New Features:
- popup (action) page
- context menu
- enable/disable option

Options:
- maximize new windows when they are created
- ignore minimized windows


For any problems/suggestions, please open a new issue on GitHub at:
https://github.com/ericchase/addon--maximize-windows/issues
